apiLevel.description: The API level this extension targets. If it does not match the current version, the extension will not be loaded.

blocked.description: A list of URLs to block all requests to. This is implemented by checking if the start of the URL matches.

cors.description: A list of URLs to bypass CORS for. This is implemented by checking if the start of the URL matches.

dependencies.description: A list of extension IDs that are required for the extension to load.

environment.description: Which environment this extension is capable of running in.

id.description: A unique identifier for your extension.

incompatible.description: A list of extension IDs that the extension is incompatible with. If two incompatible extensions are enabled, one of them will not load.

meta.description: Metadata about your extension for use in Moonbase.

authors.description: List of authors that worked on this extension - accepts string or object with ID.

changelog.description: A changelog to show in Moonbase. Moonbase will show the changelog for the latest version, even if it is not installed.

deprecated.description: Whether the extension is deprecated and no longer receiving updates.

description.description: A longer description that can use Markdown.

name.description: A human friendly name for your extension as a proper noun.

source.description: The URL to the source repository.

tagline.description: A short tagline that appears below the name.

tags.description: A list of tags that are relevant to the extension.

settings.description: A list of settings for your extension, where the key is the settings ID.

suggested.description: A list of extension IDs that the user may want to install.

version.description: A version string for your extension - doesn't need to follow a specific format. Required for publishing.
